subject: Sales
title: The Consultative Close
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on The Consultative Close.

hook.text: Instead of pitching, a rep asks questions for thirty minutes. The buyer closes the deal themselves.

buildup.text: The consultative close replaces selling with advising. The rep diagnoses before prescribing.

discovery.text: When buyers feel genuinely understood, resistance vanishes. They need confirmation, not convincing.

twist.text: This close takes longer but produces far higher lifetime value. Quick closes create quick cancellations.

climax.text: Ask better questions. Understand the real problem. The close becomes a natural conclusion, not a push.

punchline.text: Understand the problem and the close finds itself.

quiz.question: How does the consultative close differ from traditional closes?
options: It replaces pitching with diagnosing the buyer's needs
